scripts.cleanInstall: yarn cache clean && yarn clean && rm -rf yarn.lock && yarn install && yarn compile && yarn format && yarn lint && yarn types
scripts.release: dotenv -- turbo run compile && changeset publish
scripts.publish-packages: turbo run compile lint test && changeset version && changeset publish
scripts.watch: yarn compile && dotenv -- turbo run watch --filter=./programs/* --concurrency=5

name: extension
description: The monorepo of all things Extension.js, including the Extension.js CLI, its programs, packages, website, and documentation.
